sentences.en: Beth the dietician was a dilemma.
sentences.cn: 饮食学家贝丝进退两难.

sentences.en: His wife , a biochemist , was a dietician at a research institute.
sentences.cn: 学生物化学的 老伴儿 在一家研究所里做营养试验.

sentences.en: The best advice is to consult your doctor or a dietician.
sentences.cn: 最好的建议是向你的医生或营养师咨询.

words.tran_cn: 营养学家；[医]膳食学家（等于dietitian）

trans.tran_en: someone who is trained to give people advice about what it is healthy for them to eat and drink
